Articles.Content: I've scanned over DMP a bit.. I see a lot of my questions, but few answers.. what is the current status of it? Is docking currently working? .90 compatible? Is there a page that shows all implemented features at this point?

You asked this already, I gave you a slight answer but I haven't put effort into maintaining any type of feature list.

Also, the only reason I answered this is because some of us modders have a bot that checks the forum for us - It's better to keep questions in the actual mod thread
wait, there's a bot for this? Since when!

You asked this already, I gave you a slight answer but I haven't put effort into maintaining any type of feature list.

Also, the only reason I answered this is because some of us modders have a bot that checks the forum for us - It's better to keep questions in the actual mod thread

Sorry godark, i posted this one first... Main reason being there are more hits by all users in the forum lobby.. hence more users would see my post, and possibly someone with some experience using your mod. Basically, trying to ease some of your work load answering 1000 questions.. lol .. however if you have a bot scanning the forum every so often for posts, I guess it was a pointless gesture.. lol

Edited January 1, 2015 by Talavar
